name: Monster Clash - Fun Action Game FREE!
name_original: Monster Clash - Fun Action Game FREE!
description:
The Epic Monster Clash is Now in the App Store, the Ultimate Heavyweight Battle!
Choose your character and battle the Monsters in the Epic Monster Clash! As you take on the monsters armed with blobs, you will have to quickly improve your skills to beat your deadly opponents!

* Choose your weapons, select your monster and get get ready for battle
* Visit the training centre to earn coins & upgrade
* Change your tactics depending on which way the wind is blowing
* Beat your opponents and move up the ranks

PRO TIPS
- Visit the store to choose your weapons and monster
- Watch which way the wind is blowing
- Adapt your strategy for the strength of the wind
- Use a finger swipe to attack your opponents
- Switch between different weapons
